component.summary: ReC98 source port of the first Seihou Project game

description.p: Requires the data files of an existing game copy. If they are missing, the game indicates their expected location at startup.

This release comes bundled with IPAMonaGothic, a free and metric-compatible alternative for the MS Gothic font used in the original Windows version. For pixel-perfect text rendering, put msgothic.ttc into one of your system's standard font directoires, as listed by fc-cache -v.
